entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 04:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: NNE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
